overview:
As a co-founder with a creative mind and intensive hate for paper-works, Ole Marius put on the Art Director nametag before the CEO even knew what hit him. Working around the clock with his twin-powered brother in da house, he’s making tomorrows web-experience better step by step.

Ole’s position involves planning of projects and implementation, including development of front-end. He has an active participation in UI design, as well as establishing work plans and schedules, whilst monitoring and evaluating progress.

Specialties:

Frontend Development, UI Implementation, Product Development
